response.message: Thank you. It will be an honour to work with such an awesome team going forward.
Well done Willy, keep up the awesome work!!

Anyone else feeling like there's an avalanche approaching?

Anyway, congrats to the new moderators.
Gratz Diago, now don't go randomly delete my answers ;-)

Congratulations to Willie (Diago), and the rest of the team of course. I have updated my StackOverflow moderators map with the locations of the new moderators:

http://maps.google.com/maps/ms?ie=UTF&msa=0&msid=
112809495357897188939.00046d992b2ab4a0b5c81

This group didn't provide many location details in their profiles, so I had to dig a little:

http://www.huffingtonpost.com/users/profile/TheTXI

http://cid-6e9bc84c9f2fbe44.profile.live.com/

https://twitter.com/lowellheddings

Congratulations to Willie (Diago), and the rest of the team of course. I have updated my StackOverflow moderators map with the locations of the new moderators:

http://bit.ly/EkTOM

I'm glad they  fit in the profile: 

    * patient and fair
    * leads by example
    * shows respect for their fellow users in their actions and words

Congratulations!!
Grats and good luck! We will help all we can. :)

I, for one, welcome our new moderator overlords.

Sorry, couldn't resist. Congrats all round. With any luck this will distract TheTXI from Meta enough for me to take his #2 place.

Jon Skeet:

Over my dead body.

i don't know why, but i find your fascination with ewoks abit disturbing..... :-)

glad i don't have to type in ewok.adventure anymore.
